quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants. – Isaac Newton
fact: If we had the same mortality rate now as in 1900, more than half the people in the world today would not be alive.

joke: If you’re struggling to think of what to get someone for Christmas. Get them a fridge and watch their face light up when they open it.
